experience.responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable backend services using Java and the Spring Boot framework. Optimized core C++ libraries used for high-frequency data processing, reducing latency by 12%. Collaborated with the QA team to implement automated integration tests.

Assisted in the migration of legacy Java applications to a microservices architecture. Debugged and patched memory leaks in C++ system modules. Participated in daily scrum meetings and contributed to technical documentation.
